title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 18 בינואר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Full Stack Developer,Senior Software QA Analyst, Marketing Content Writer, מנהלת הפקה ולקוחות, Java/J2EE Developer
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Full Stack Developer,Senior Software QA Analyst, Marketing Content Writer, מנהלת הפקה ולקוחות, Java/J2EE Developer

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
גיקטיים הוא אתר הטכנולוגיה המוביל והגדול בישראל וזאת גם הסיבה שכל החברות הגדולות בתחום עובדות איתנו.
אם אתם אוהבים לתת שירות לפחות כמו שאתם מכורים לטכנולוגיה, אם אתם תקתקנים, סוגרי קצוות, אנרגטיים ונעימים ואם אתם רוצים להיות בחזית של כל מה שקורה בעולם הטכנולוגיה, זה המקום בשבילכם.
במסגרת התפקיד, מנהל\ת ההפקה והלקוחות יהיו אחראים על ניהול הקשר השוטף עם הלקוחות, כולל קריאטיב, תפעול, דיווחים שוטפים, דוחות וניהול הפקה כולל.
כמו כן, התפקיד כולל אחריות מלאה על תפעול והפקת אירועי הטכנולוגיה הגדולים.
התפקיד כולל גם עבודת Hands-on.
דרישות:
זמינות למשרה מלאה – עבודה במשרד ברמת החייל
להגשת קורות חיים למשרת מנהל\ת הפקה ולקוחות – GeekTime
 
Expanding its North American sales team, Optimove is seeking a high-energy, ambitious and passionate sales professional. This is an exciting time to join a rapidly-growing company that is already an established market leader in many countries
In this position, you will develop and expand business opportunities, while managing the complete B2B software sales lifecycle. You will target, educate and motivate new customers to embrace Optimove’s revolutionary software to meet their customer retention needs.Moreover, you will play a key role in building and growing Optimove’s business presence in North America.
This role requires an autonomous self-starter with outstanding interpersonal capabilities coupled with highly-effective time management skills
Requirements:
Build and nurture new customer relationships from prospecting through closure
Research and prospect into new accounts
Drive lead acquisition and qualification
Deliver Web-based and in-person sales presentations and demonstrations
Participate in joint marketing activities
Occasionally travel to trade shows and industry events
To send a CV for the position of  New Business Manager, USA – Optimove
Our technology-driven internet company is looking to add top-notch people to our team. We are looking for a talented and analytical student to join our marketing analysis team on a part time basis (must have 2.5 free days for work). If you want to become part of a fun and unique work-culture, enjoy great employee benefits and take-on as much responsibility as you can handle, then read on.
Requirements:
University student with at least 1 year until graduation
Availability for 2.5 working days per week
Strong communication skills and a positive, professional attitude
Hardworking, eager to achieve & exceed objectives, and take on more responsibility
Good writing skills
Good analytical skills
To send a CV for the position of Marketin Analyst –  Natural Intelligence
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer – Expert Invest
We have an immediate opening for an Embedded Reverse Engineer to join our team. The position provides an opportunity to develop the cutting-edge technology that supports the company’s leading products.
The selected candidate will work with collaborative teams to design and develop advanced cyber solutions. The team members constantly enhance their skills set by working with a talented and technically accomplished group of experts. The employee will also enjoy a flexible working environment.
Key Responsibility
The Embedded Reverse Engineer analyzes, decomposes, disassembles code, performs static code analysis, debugs and modifies software.
We specialize in exploitation and analysis of computer networks & devices with a wireless and embedded focus.
Work often involves research of software operating systems, malware or electronic systems. It is also includes Protocol Analysis, Vulnerability Assessment, Security Research, and Rapid Prototyping of proof of concept capabilities.
Requirements:

To send a CV for the position of Embedded Reverse Engineer – אלביט מערכות בע”מ 
Radware is looking for a strong Java/J2EE developer to join a team developing a cutting-edge management system for complex application delivery and security solutions for enterprises, service providers, and Cloud environments.
Key responsibilities:
Requirements:
Strong Java/J2EE background (at least 5 years)
Strong familiarity with open source tools and frameworks
Independent and highly motivated
Fast learner
Team player, great interpersonal skills
Hands-on experience with one or more of the following:
To send a CV for the position of Java/J2EE Developer (Server-Side) – radware
The successful candidate will perform application security assessments, codereviews, and SDLC consulting.
Projects mayinclude:
· Performing applicationvulnerability assessments
· Performing code review acrossa variety of programming languages
· Performing assessments ofSDLC processes
· Developing testing scriptsand procedures
· Other security-relatedprojects that may be assigned according to skills
Requirements:
The successful candidate should meet most of the following requirements:
· Strong ethics and understanding of ethics in business and information security
· Proficient English language written and oral communication skills
· Understanding and familiarity with common code review methods and standards
· Experience with code scanning toolsets such as appscan, checkmarx ,veracode, fortify
· Knowledge of OWASP tools and methodologies
· Understanding of HTTP and web programming
· Knowledge of common security requirements within ASP.NET application
· Knowledge of standard SDLC practices
· Minimum of 3 years work experience in application security
· Experience with high level programming languages (e.g., Java, C, C++, .NET,Scala,HTML5,PHP,Perl,Python)
· Experience with web application development (e.g., ASP.NET, ASP, PHP, J2EE, JSP)
· Knowledge with AJAX, SAML,RESTAPI,OAuth
· Ability to complete tasks and deliver professionally written reports for clients
· Ability to present findings to technical staff and executives
· Experience with vulnerability scanning tools (e.g., Qualys, Nessus, MVM, Accunetix,Burpsuite)
· Optional :
Possess current security certifications (e.g., CISSP, CEH)
Degree in either Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Information Systems Management
To send a CV for the position of Application Security Expert – playtech
Feedvisor is seeking to add a skilled marketing content writer to its team. The marketing content writer will work with the marketing team to create compelling campaigns and attention-grabbing content for outbound marketing, lead generation, presentations and conferences.
The ideal candidate will have professional experience as a writer, editor, content creator, and/or communications professional. They must be highly organized and have the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Understanding complex topics and writing about them in a simplistic fashion is a key success factor for this role.
Responsibilities:
Requirements:
3+ years in content writing experience, preferably in a hi-tech/software company.
Native level written and spoken English, with a flair for being creative and thinking outside the box.
Experience in community management and writing a company blog.
Experience using a content management system (CMS) for creating web content.
Experience in editing Wikipedia, or other MediaWiki based sites
University level degree, B.A. or above
Quick learner, with a good grasp of technical concepts
Familiarity and understanding of SEO best practices – advantage
HTML skills – advantage.
Experience with marketing tools (Mailchimp, Marketo, Hootsuite) – advantage
To send a CV for the position of Marketing Content Writer – feedvisor
At ConteXtream (an HPE company) we develop cutting edge carrier grade networking solutions for SDN & NFV. Network virtualization and cloud computing are two of the most challenging technologies. At ConteXtream we are figuring out how smart software running on standard compute platforms can deliver best in class network virtualization solutions for network operators.
We develop complex network based features over a distributed based solution under high scale and full resiliency requirements.
As our Senior Java developer you will be responsible to design and develop  complex systems & technologies . You will be responsible for analysis, requirements definition, design, programming, implementation, debugging, modifying and testing of code for our next generation product suite.
Expertise in complex systems/technologies design and development.
Requirements:
•          Knowledge of networking.
•          Knowledge and experience in Linux environments & scripts.
•          5 +years of experience as a Software developer.
•          Proven design/ architecture work in complex components.
•          Experience with open source community- Advantage to ODL
To send a CV for the position of Senior JAVA Developer – hpe
Develop and maintain test policies and procedures to support growth of the software and QA team
Evaluate product and user story specifications and convert them into actionable test plans
Actively participate in sprint planning sessions to plan testing strategy for releases
Collaborate with our New-York based product and sales team made of Wall-Street investment banks, rating agencies and Bloomberg veterans
Leverage your experience and skills to help the team, its members and our product become better.
Requirements:
At least 5+ years working as part of a QA/testing group, on production web applications.
In depth knowledge of QA test methodologies and strategies.
Experienced in writing STD and STP documents.
Autonomous, self-motivating, able to jump in and drive change and improvement.
Education: BA or BSc.
Good communicator and a team player.
Fluent English.
Nice to haves:
Hands-on experience with test automation tools such as Selenium.
Knowledge or interest in financial concepts.
To send a CV for the position of Senior Software QA Analyst T-REX Group
